scripts.test: yarn build && cd lib && node --enable-source-maps index && cd ..
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && tsc --pretty false --removeComments true && cp -r src/dashboard lib/ && cd lib && find . -path ./dashboard -prune -o -type f -exec sed -i 's/[	]\{1,\}//g; s/    //g' {} + > /dev/null 2>&1 && cd ..
scripts.build:full: rm -r lib && cd ./src/dashboard && yarn build && cd ../.. && yarn build
